info.name: GMail - 2018 Design / Redesign: Compact
info.description: The intention was to leave the original design, and make it better. It was a bit too much from Google, but nothing I can't fix, since every element is not that hard to redo. But for the difference, see the screenshots.
info.additionalInfo:
I didn't go for an ultra compact code in favor for commenting the most and necessary things.

Release 1.1:
• Removed the border-radius of the labels
• Removed the border-radius of the labels in the left menu

Release 1.2:
• Got rid of the whole boxy things at the left menu. Looks more clean now and added some standard things.

Release 1.3:
• Cascading the mails for better visibility.

Release 1.3.1:
• Missed the labels shown, if you open a message. Fixed.

Release 1.4:
• Fixed the searchbar and buttons for it. Google decided to change the anchors for it, so I had too. Sorry for the long time I didn't update my style: Was busy with my private life.
